title: KD87A Skeleton
text: Compact, ergonomic TKL type gaming keyboard, equipped with Gateron Red mechanical switches with factory-waxed bounces, double-shot keycaps with top engraving of ENG symbols, RGB backlighting, greased stabilizers and noise dampeners.

title: Doublshot keycaps
text: These keycaps are made of PBT plastic. Keycaps are made using Doubleshot technology. This makes the walls thick and durable.

title: Hand lubricated stabilizers
text: To reduce the 'leechlike' sounds have been installed stabilizers for improved mechanical design on the Dark Project, which are manually greased during production. The keyboard has a soft, pleasant key motion without ear irritation sound.

title: Modular cable
text: The wire itself is covered with an elastic wear-resistant braid, which will protect against contact with the table surface and other undesirable influences.

title: RGB
text: Vivid and colorful RGB illumination with the widest range of settings. Under each key there is a separate diode which provides a directed light beam, the intensity and color regulated at the level of the branded software from the manufacturer.

title: TKL
text: Compact TKL keyboard in classic design. 87 keycaps.
